color-text-weak.comment: Weak body text for visual hierarchy.
color-text-weak.name: color-text-weak

color-text-link-destructive-light.comment: Light shade of destructive link text to be used in interactions
color-text-link-destructive-light.name: color-text-link-destructive-light

color-text-error-dark.comment: Dark error text for inputs and error misc
color-text-error-dark.name: color-text-error-dark

color-text-neutral.comment: Color for text indicating a neutral status.
color-text-neutral.name: color-text-neutral

color-text-error.comment: Error text for inputs and error misc
color-text-error.name: color-text-error

color-text-icon-inverse.comment: Default icon color for inverse backgrounds.
color-text-icon-inverse.name: color-text-icon-inverse

color-text-link-dark.comment: Dark shade of link text to be used in interactions
color-text-link-dark.name: color-text-link-dark

color-text-brand-inverse.comment: Text color used on any brand color
color-text-brand-inverse.name: color-text-brand-inverse

color-text-brand-highlight.comment: Twilio brand red, accessible on large text only.
color-text-brand-highlight.name: color-text-brand-highlight

color-text-inverse-weaker.comment: Weaker inverse text color for dark backgrounds. Must pass AA color contrast with color-background-body-inverse.
color-text-inverse-weaker.name: color-text-inverse-weaker

color-text-link-light.comment: Light shade of link text to be used in interactions
color-text-link-light.name: color-text-link-light

color-text-inverse.comment: Inverse text color for dark backgrounds. Must pass AA color contrast with color-background-body-inverse.
color-text-inverse.name: color-text-inverse

color-text-error-light.comment: Light error text for inputs and error misc
color-text-error-light.name: color-text-error-light

color-text-weaker.comment: Weaker body text for visual hierarchy. Inaccessible unless used on disabled controls.
color-text-weaker.name: color-text-weaker

color-text-link-destructive-dark.comment: Dark shade of destructive link text to be used in interactions
color-text-link-destructive-dark.name: color-text-link-destructive-dark
